message: Let's split the money evenly. I'll take $600000 and you'll get $400000.
You're being too generous with the smaller share, I'm not biting!
I propose we split the money equally. Both of us would receive $500000.
You're still being too soft on me, I want more!
I think we should stick closer to an even split. I'll take $400000 and you'll get $600000.
